pages.text: $(li)The Small End Islands is a biome composed mostly of empty expanses between the Larger Islands of the End, populated only by smaller, circle-shaped islands.$(br)$(li)You can find $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermen$(/l) in this biome.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Small End Islands$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
